summary: Various color choices for male Draugr and Draugr Skeleton eye glow. Other colors may be considered. Let me know in the comments. I will be quickly taking this mod further with a few tricks when the CK comes out, so track it if you\'re interested.
descriptionHtml:
Various color choices for male Draugr and Draugr Skeleton eye glow. Other colors may be considered. Let me know in the comments. 

I have future plans for improving this mod in several ways, so track it if you\'re interested.

Just in time for Friday the 13th!


Cyan (light blue) eyes are a great choice, I just wanted to change things up a bit. To annoy my friends at halflife2.net, I made them magenta (which is obviously the best color in the universe). 


COLOR CHOICES AVAILABLE:

* Magenta (Red 100%, Green 0%, Blue 100%)

* Yellow-Green

* White has been added by request from Silvaner.

* Red - available here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4492

* YOUR FAVORITE COLOR COULD GO HERE


Additional colors may be considered. Let me know in the comments.


Thanks to CheeseyBall and awkward avenger for inspiration to experiment on the skeleton eyes.


To uninstall, remove this file:

skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\draugr\\character assets\\fxdraugrmaleeyes.nif

To try another other color, overwrite the file.


I highly recommend \'Skeleton retexture by JazzJR\':
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4720

   __________________
I HAVE OTHER UPLOADS :D
   __________________
[list]
[*]Rift Performance PLUS

[*]Child Eyes 30 Colors

[*]V s Conjuration Sounds

[*]Rulf, level 1 Imperial - game start

[*]Rulf, level 49 Imperial - Corrupt Paladin Werewolf
[/list]
    _________
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3137532]FIND THEM HERE[/url]
    _________
author: VirusType2 AKA Vergis
